text:
This place is not easy to be found. After you found the Uncle Ringo funfair, you have to find a small path next to it and walk in. Then inside you will find a few plots of lands dedicated to small enterprises doing planting.

This place has a wide range of unique plants. I think if it is not unique, they will not stock it. Price is reasonable for this unique plants.

Opening hours are short so do plan properly.

amazing selection of plants! they are currently having sales to prep for their next restock and they were to nice to sell them for really affordable! managed to snag a nice philodendron fuzzy petioleðŸ¤¤ðŸ¤¤ the staff there were really nice and friendly too! one of my favourite nurseries in singapore for sure
good selection of alocasia and begonia too!

Greenhouse-like nursery House of Plants is an almost secret alcove for plant lovers. Here the enthusiast will find an assortment of Philodendrons, Rhaphidophoras, Begonias and many other house plants. Well-organised and reasonably priced, my visit has always been welcomed with a smile and cheer, albeit behind a facial mask (in this pandemic times). I have no complaints about this nursery--it warrants a visit each time I am within its vicinity.

My only gripe would be they cut down the usage of plastic bags and opt for reusable, environmentally paper bags instead. Otherwise, great place. Drop by when you can!

I went there walking randomly. And messaged the lady owner. She is extremely friendly and a breath of fresh air. Making this world a better place.

The collection of plants are simple and full of love, like someoneâ€™s dream garden. What a nice place.
Thank you so much for breeding beautiful plants!!! It made my day worthwhile. Hoping my plants will grow so well and healthy!
